TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ComboBoxRenderer extends System.Object
public ref class ComboBoxRenderer abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ComboBoxRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于以视觉样式呈现组合框控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a combo box control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一组 `static` 方法，这些方法可用于使用操作系统的当前视觉样式呈现组合框控件。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a combo box control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 如果要绘制的自定义控件应具有当前视觉样式的外观，此方法非常有用。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要绘制组合框，请使用 方法绘制文本框，并使用方法绘制 下拉箭头。To draw a combo box, use the method to draw the text box and the method to draw the drop-down arrow. 如果在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区， 将绘制具有当前视觉样式的组合框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, and will draw the combo box with the current visual style. 否则，这些方法将引发 。Otherwise, these methods will throw an . 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，可以检查属性的值 。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 此类包装 设置为和类公开的元素之一的的功能 。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the and classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [用视觉样式呈现控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个自定义控件，该控件使用 和 方法来绘制响应鼠标单击的组合框。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the and methods to draw a combo box that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 使用操作系统当前视觉样式绘制一个下拉箭头。

span.span: Draws a drop-down arrow with the current visual style of the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用此方法之前，应验证属性是否 返回 `true` 。Before calling this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 自定义控件的方法中的方法在 由鼠标指针的位置确定的状态下绘制下拉箭头。The following code example uses the method in a custom control's method to draw a drop-down arrow in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#4)]

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.

exception.span: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
